MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL27 and LL32  postcode  areas of Trefriw and Conwy , affecting properties in Conway Road, Bryn Morfa and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties with the repairs on site and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5 PM on 23rd April 2021.
